content.description: The following question refers to the topic of the origins and effects of industrialization.
content.question: Which of the following best explains Great Britainâ€™s early industrial dominance?

choices.label: The supply of cheap labor from overseas immigrants to Britain
Easy access to raw materials such as coal and iron

content.answer: Easy access to raw materials such as coal and iron

topic.text: 6.1: Contextualizing Industrialization and its Origins and Effects

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
